title: Our Policemen
creator_credit: Joan Boundy and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: The film aims to further an appreciation in children of the work of the police - not only as custodians of the law but also as friendly helpers in the community.
creator_credit_for_label: Joan Boundy and Australian National Film Board
